– Cabinet Refacing” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36|text_align:left|color:%231d2634″ el_class=”heading-title” css=”.vc_custom_1510646153442{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1509814714644{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]If your kitchen is looking a bit old, odds are that you don’t need a whole kitchen remodel, you just need cabinet refacing. Don’t tear out and replace the entire cabinet structure, which is usually perfectly solid.
You can simply have the outside of the cabinets replaced and updated, giving your kitchen a brand new look at a fraction of the cost of full kitchen remodeling.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image
